detailsData.title: Tradition
detailsData.content: With over 40 years of practicing in the Middle Tennessee area we have built a reputation on providing sound legal advice.

detailsData.title: Personal Approach
detailsData.content: We pride ourselves on the relationships we build with our clients. Our success comes from our commitment to understanding the needs of our clients.

detailsData.title: Family Owned
detailsData.content: We are a small family business committed to providing quality service. Our reputation is rooted in our founder, Larry R. Williams’ commitment to providing honest, straight forward legal advice.

detailsData.title: Aggressive
detailsData.content: We are assertive advocates. Our lawyers are passionate about what they do and will aggressively pursue your legal matter to ensure you get the result you deserve.

valueProp: Our Nashville personal injury attorneys, Tennessee Social Security attorneys, Estate Planning lawyers, and business lawyers make Larry R. Williams, PLLC a full-service law firm that has served clients in middle Tennessee for over 35 years.
CTA: CLICK HERE FOR A FREE CASE EVALUATION

testimonalData.text: Thank you, Jonathan. You have fought very hard for us and we appreciate all you’ve done for us.
testimonalData.author: Jane F.

testimonalData.text: We are so thankful to have met and worked with this firm and would recommend this firm to everyone.
testimonalData.author: Adell N

testimonalData.text: Jonathan handled my case in a warm but professional fashion. I could not have asked for a better attorney!
testimonalData.author: Sally W.
